content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully deployed on the map in these steps. Although the agent repeatedly attempted to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, all placement and crafting attempts failed due to resource shortages and missing inventory items. Pre‐existing production units (such as the furnace at (5.0, 5.0) for iron plate smelting and the copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper plate production) were referenced for processing but were not created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Errors with get_entities API usage
 – Incorrect argument usage was detected (using an unexpected keyword “radius” and supplying extra positional arguments). Verify the function’s signature against the API documentation and use only supported parameters.

• Lab placement failures
 – Attempts to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) failed because no lab item was available in the inventory. Ensure that the Lab or its constituent parts are present prior to placement.

• Lab crafting errors due to insufficient sub-ingredients
 – Multiple crafting attempts failed because required sub-components (such as iron‑gear‑wheel, electronic‑circuit, and copper‑cable) were missing or could not be produced. Confirm that all intermediate products are available (through proper smelting or prior crafting) and that their production chains are complete before initiating Lab crafting.

• Iteration on NoneType results
 – A “NoneType” object was erroneously iterated over when processing the output of get_entities. Always check that API calls return a valid list (or an empty one) before performing iterations.
